CustomField.description: Use this field to specify the condition to display the records where logged-in user is associated with the record. E.g.: If there is a Contact’s SDG and the logged in user wants to view the contacts where he/she is the Owner along with all the contacts where he/she is the Account Owner, then write query as “(Owner.ID = <<User.Id>> OR Account.OwnerId= <<User.Id>>)”. This will be further used by Universal Filter to display the desired filtered result.
CustomField.label: My Records
